metadata.title: CVE-2018-17233 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the functionH5D__create_chunk_file_map_hyper() of H5Dchunk.c in the HDF HDF5 through1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because ofincorrect protection against division by zero. It could allow a remotedenial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
